pr_title: [#1463] fixed handling of fast check issues in validate action

timeline.bodyText: Theoretically we'd need to do a SubMonitor.convert(monitor) with two ticks such that we can pass the monitor consistently into the child processors. Not sure if it matters a lot, though.
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: I'd be ok with a 1:1 split since I assume that both list will almost always have the same number or at least almost the same number of entries (most validations are FAST).
replies.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: If we want to go all-in, that we use the combined sizes of both lists as the number of ticks.
replies.author: szarnekow
